title: Tender for Supply 360,000 Vials of Desferrioxamine Mesylate for Injection BP/USP, 500MG
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health, to call for local tenders in the open market for the purchase of 30,000 vials of the above, as recommended by the Procurement Appeal Board (PAB), was approved by the Cabinet.
